summary: Implements a comprehensive word error rate (WER) metric for automatic speech recognition, supporting various decoding strategies (CTC, RNNT, multitask) and providing utilities for dimension handling, detailed error analysis, and per‑utterance scoring, integrated with torchmetrics for seamless use in training pipelines.
business_intent: Enable accurate evaluation of speech‑to‑text models by quantifying transcription errors, thereby supporting model development, benchmarking, and quality assurance in ASR applications.
